snippet: GOLDSMITH--Barbara. The Board of Trustees and staff of the American Academy in Rome mourn the passing of friend and noted author Barbara Goldsmith. Known for her kind and generous spirit, Barbara was an AAR Trustee Emerita and founded The Barbara ...
lead_paragraph: GOLDSMITH--Barbara. The Board of Trustees and staff of the American Academy in Rome mourn the passing of friend and noted author Barbara Goldsmith. Known for her kind and generous spirit, Barbara was an AAR Trustee Emerita and founded The Barbara Goldsmith Rare Book Room in the Arthur & Janet C. Ross Library. 1/3
